caption.p: Main chemical structures are involved in the inhibition of the inflammatory process. Sigmoidin A and B ( 1), Erycristagallin ( 2), Abyssinone V-4′-methyl ether ( 3), Waragalone ( 4), Mildbenone ( 5), Mildbone ( 6), 2″-O-galloyl orientin ( 7), Neobavaisoflavone ( 8) and Hypaphorine ( 9). The chemical structures were created with the ACD/ChemSketch Freeware program.
